message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
